metadata.name: Replace.exe Usage
metadata.comment: Detects the use of Replace.exe which can be used to replace file with another file

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\replace.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-a')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/a')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('–a')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('—a')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('―a'))))

output.summary: Detects the use of Replace.exe which can be used to replace file with another file
